item.title: Ansible - How to Wait for on a Kubernetes Service with the Kubernetes Core Collection
item.description: I recently got stuck trying to figure out how to wait for a Kuberentes Services - this post will cover how I handled it with the Kuberentes Core Ansible Collection.
